summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the non-profit corporation Gratitude America, Ltd., filed with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor in the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the corporation is authorized to conduct business and is in good standing as of the date of the certification.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, who issued the certification of good standing for Gratitude America, Ltd.

events.title: Incorporation of Gratitude America, Ltd.
events.description: Gratitude America, Ltd. filed Articles of Incorporation.

events.title: Certificate of Incorporation Issued
events.description: A Certificate of Incorporation was issued authorizing Gratitude America, Ltd. to conduct business.

locations: 5049 Kongens Gads, Charlotte Amalie, Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Gratitude America, Ltd. was incorporated on April 25, 2012.
The corporation received its Certificate of Incorporation on May 1, 2012.
The document certifies that Gratitude America, Ltd. is in good standing as of July 24, 2017.
